@description.name: @description
@description.body: A TestSuite is a collection of test functions, classes and other test suites, which should be run together.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
testClassOrNamespace {var} Either a string with the name of the test
    class or test namespace or a reference to the test class or namespace.
    All test in the given class/namespace will be added to the suite.
@param.description:
Either a string with the name of the test
    class or test namespace or a reference to the test class or namespace.
    All test in the given class/namespace will be added to the suite.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a test class or namespace to the suite

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
testClassOrNamespace {var} Either a string with the name of the test
    class or test namespace or a reference to the test class or namespace.
    All test in the given class/namespace will be added to the suite.
@param.description:
Either a string with the name of the test
    class or test namespace or a reference to the test class or namespace.
    All test in the given class/namespace will be added to the suite.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add all tests from the given namespace to the suite

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespace {Object} The topmost namespace of the tests classes to add.
@param.description: The topmost namespace of the tests classes to add.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a test class to the suite

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} The test class to add

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a list of all test classes in the suite

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Class[]} A list of all test classes in the suite
@return.description: A list of all test classes in the suite

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
